title: Spanish Horses at the Fair
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Raoul Millais [1901-1999], Malmesbury, Wiltshire and Westcote Manor in the Cotswolds, Gloucestershire, England. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by November 1, 1976; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1976. 

[1]. See correspondence from Dr. Fishkoff in collector file.
